import React from 'react' class PostCard extends React.Component { render(){ const image_url = "http://my.gerar.me/storage/app/images/Posts/"+this.props.post.image_url const download_url = "http://my.gerar.me/posts/download/"+this.props.post.id return (
  • {this.props.post.headline}

    Download
    Copie e Cole para Postar
    • ) } } export default PostCard
